section: The business name of the Venture will be BM&V2GO, however the partnership name will be Vaccines2Go.
explanation: There is a contradiction, since the business is said to be BM&V2GO, however the partnership name is Vaccines2Go.

section: Each of the Members has contributed to the capital of the Venture, in cash or property in agreed upon value, as follows (the "Capital Contribution"): Member Contribution Description Agreed Value BorrowMoney.com, inc 1, 500 square feet of Leased/rent office Space Includingspecified Description of duty* $3,500.00 USD JVLS, LLC dba Vaccines 2Go $60,000.00 USD From Monthly Government , City And State, And Or Private Awarded Contracts. Plus (10%) Of Any Generated Gross Revenue, In Add i t i on to The To ta l Contributions. $3,500,000.00 USD
explanation: There is a contradiction with the capital contributions. BorrowMoney.com, inc contributing 1,500 square feet for $3,500.00 USD. Meanwhile, JVLS, LLC dba Vaccines 2Go is contributing $60,000.00 from monthly government and private awards contracts Plus 10% of any generated gross revenue on top of the prior. However, the value for this is $3,500,000.00 USD. However, the contributions mentioned by both companies do not equal the value given. Thus creating a contradiction.

section: Any management vote required will be determined such that each Manager receives one vote carrying equal weight, unless otherwise decided by BorrowMoney.com inc.
explanation: There is a contradiction in the management voting, as the section mentions that each manager gets one vote carrying equal weight, unless otherwise decided by BorrowMoney.com inc. Meaning that they can change this vote weight, which is a contradiction to the prior statement.
